item.description:
It will be a log/no magic campaign set the early 13th Century in the Holy Roman Empire, more specifically the Archbischopric of Salzburg (which at this time belongs to the Kingdom of Bavaria). It will be set in the Moutains and Valleys of the Alps southeast of the City of Salzburg near Hallstatt in the dominion of the Grafen (Graves) of Wildenstein.

More details can be found in the following threads:

Campaign Information:
http://roleplayers.me...

Campaign Admin:
http://roleplayers.me...

BTW the name of the campaign can still be change until next friday.
So please submit your vote (Terra Mortalis has been a close second).

Poll:
http://roleplayers.me...
item.name: Intial Session for the new Astra et Umbra Campaign
